message.content:
The most likely category for this product would be "Pet Supplies" (18) because it is a toy specifically designed for pets. 

The second likely category would be "Toys & Games" (7) because it is a toy for pets.

The third likely category would be "Baby Products" (24) because it is a toy that can simulate a mother figure for pets.

The fourth likely category would be "Home & Kitchen" (1) because it is a product that can be used in a home setting.

The fifth likely category would be "Office Products" (19) because it could potentially be used as a stress-relief toy in an office setting.

Title: Snuggle Pet Products Snuggle Kitties Behavioral Aid Toy for Pets, Tan Tiger
Content: Everyone loves Snuggle Kitties. They come complete with "real feel" heartbeat, two types of heat and a spot for a feeding bottle. These furry critters make perfect virtual moms....
